name: WKScriptMessageHandler
desc: An interface for receiving messages from JavaScript code running in a webpage.

items.name: func userContentController(WKUserContentController, didReceive: WKScriptMessage)
items.desc: Tells the handler that a webpage sent a script message.

items.name: class WKScriptMessage
items.desc: An object that encapsulates a message sent by JavaScript code from a webpage.
